page.title: 14UPPER TOWN FARM
page.content: Mr.D.Stokes is the present owner.It was started by his grandfather over 50 years ago.The farm manager Mr.R.Tonge has been with the firm for 13 years. There are also 5 men & 3 women employed full time.Seasonal fruit pickers are also employed.The farm is 300 acres.Machinery includes 7 tractors, 4 sprayers, 2 mowers & numerous cultivators.The crops grown are: gooseberries,strawberries,plums, raspberries,loganberries,apples,pears ,black & red currants,corn & oil seed rape.Crops are sprayed regularly to kill pests & weeds.Pears are stored in 4 giant refrigerators each with a capacity of 50 tons.Fruit is sold to wholesalers in Liverpool, Evesham & Hull.The busiest time is July to October.Pick Your Own is very profitable on the farm & brings numerous visitors to the area.
